articles.title: Failure to vaccinate may turn Africa into fertile ground for new Covid-19 variants, scientists warn - HeraldLIVE
articles.description: Africa must not be left behind in the global response to Covid-19 and vaccination rollouts, lest the continent becomes a breeding ground for new variants.

articles.title: COVID-19 infections in Africa has dropped by 20%, WHO reveals - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: The World Health Organisation (WHO) has said that COVID-19 infections in Africa had dropped by more than 20 per cent, noting that it was the sharpest seven-day drop in two months, as the third wave pandemic winds down.
